INSERT INTO zgk_user_info ( id, token, name, icon, schoolName, grade, birthdayDate, sex, subjectType, mail, qq, provinceId, cityId, countyId, alipayUserId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{token}, #{name}, #{icon}, #{schoolName}, #{grade}, #{birthdayDate}, #{sex}, #{subjectType}, #{mail}, #{qq}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{countyId}, #{alipayUserId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE zgk_user_account SET canTargetSchool=FALSE WHERE id=#{uid}
mapper.select: select info.token as token , info.name as name , info.icon as icon , info.provinceId as provinceId, info.cityId as cityId, info.countyId as countyId , info.schoolName as schoolName , info.grade as grade, info.birthdayDate as birthdayDate , info.sex as sex , info.subjectType as subjectType , info.mail as mail , info.qq as qq, market.accountId, market.qrCodeUrl, market.sharerId, market.sharerType, market.agentLevel, card.productType as vipType from zgk_user_info info left join zgk_user_market market on info.id=market.accountId LEFT JOIN zgk_card card on card.userId=info.id WHERE info.id=#{id} limit 1
